reviews.review: Si comme moi vous avez jouer au tout premier Half-Life, vous vous amuserez encore plus sur ce jeu ! Bon Gameplay, histoire entrainante, IA pas mauvaise, décor tres beau, armes d'enfer bref un très bon jeu a avoir ! Par contre je vous recommande de jouer d'abord au premier pour comprendre un peu l'histoire ;)
Obviously the best game in the world.
Duh, Its Half Life

現在のFPSに影響を与えたゲーム,らしい。
ゲーム自体は面白かった。シングルゲーにしてはボリュームもそこそこある。
でも前作からの続きの体でいきなり話が始まったので、出てくるキャラクターの話す内容、テンションについていけなかった。本気で楽しみたいなら２からやるべきではない。
あと、乗り物に乗ってる時間が意外と長く少し冗長かなと感じた。
発売された８年前には画期的であったこのゲームも、今もっと発展したFPSをプレイしている人がやったところでなんら斬新だと感じる部分はないだろう。
しかしMODの多さからこのゲームがどれほどリスペクトされていたかがわかる。
FPSの歴史を感じ取るためのゲーム。
発売当時にやりたかった。
Una delle storie più emozionanti di sempre. Troppo bello / One of most beautiful stories ever. Really beautiful.
Игра - Шедевр. Никогда не надоест. Раз в пару лет точно можно перепройти полностью. 10 из 10.
POOR LAZLO......THE FINEST MIND OF HIS GENERATION...TO COME TO SUCH AN END ;__;  shall his ant lion torn body rest in peace......

So, I spent ages trying to think of one single thing wrong with this game and I just couldn't. This game is literally amazing, no other word can describe it. 

Half Life 2 came out in 2004, which seems hard to believe considering it's graphics are still considered good by todays standards, but the graphics arn't the main point of this game, to me, it's the storyline. 

Half Life 2 has one of the best storylines in any game I have played, it did well on delivering the dark, gloomy, alienated atmospehere of the new Earth. 

Anyone who hasn't got this game already, should, because it's fucking great and definetly worth the price. Just buy paying even just 5 pounds for this game, you're ripping steam off.
I have to say Half Life 2 is an amazing game to play and it is worth playing. It looks great on my quad core gaming laptop. It is worth every penny.
Really one of the best games I've ever played and probably the best PC game ever.  The game is long and diverse and can be replayed numerous times and still be fun and amazing.  This is a must have.

in the industry-changing package we know as half-life 2, the story and characters are arguably the strongest part
aside from that, you get cute and quirky physics puzzles, alongside some unfortunately dull combat scenarios

it's difficult to recommend half-life 2 on the basis of gameplay alone. the experience relies more on the journey as a whole.
understandably, that's not everyone's cup of tea, especially with the aforementioned dull combat at play.

there are a lot of very good decisions, such as seeing everything through the protagonist's eyes as opposed to viewing cutscenes, but a lot of these feel like they were bred out of limitations, rather than being conscious design choices.

regardless of these aforementioned problems, i would recommend half-life 2, as a whole, episodes included. at the very least, it's certainly worth a shot.

In this game, Gordon Freeman returns for his most epic adventure yet. Taking place in an environment much larger than Black Mesa, the player will explore all sorts of new regions and fight off an even more daunting enemy. The gameplay is fantastic and even rivals its predecessor in terms of smoothness. Overall, this is the game that all PC gamers should play through at least once. An entire new generation of games has been made with standards set by this game.
The game is pretty sweet and still looks pretty good despite it's age.

Como nunca había jugado los episodios adicionales, decidí volver a jugar HL2 para refrescar la historia y los personajes. Al principio pensé que no iba a estar a la altura, para sorprenderme porque este juego sigue estando a la altura de los mejores del género y te atrapa completamente. Otra virtud es lo increíblemente bien que se ve más allá del paso de los años. Muy recomendable, en todo sentido.
Everything that could have been said about Half-Life 2 has already been said.

Half Life 2... What is there to say about this game that hasn't already been said? This is one of the best games of all time, and I believe that you cannot call yourself a true gamer until you have played it. Half Life 2 has all the elements of a stellar video game: action, suspense, character development, challenge, puzzle, back story, gameplay mechanics, and extreme innovation.

The feel of this game is like no other; you assume the role of a theoretical physicist in a dystopian future where an alien race has enslaved most of humanity. Playing this game you will literally feel the triumph and the loss of the human race. You will experience the horrors and the adventures of the dystopia. And above all, you will fight for freedom in this near-perfect video game.

9.8 out of 10.

Probably one of the most important FPS games, it has all the pratfalls ofthe FPSes of its time, but the deep, immersive plot and harrowing setpieces/creatures blind you to any minor flaw that could be present here. Plus there's Gravity Guns.

10/10

One of the best games of all time!
Still one of the best games of its time, if you have money to spend, buy this series!

An achievement in gameplay, sound design, visuals, story, and all other facets of video game design, it is truly deserving of the numerous game of the year (and to somepublications, game of the decade) awards it has under its belt. A very innovative game for the time, it's still a blast to play today. You won't regret this purchase.
Physics

What can anyone say about Half-Life 2 that hasn't already been said a thousand times already? An AMAZING story that never stops for anything, and a linear progression through the game that takes you from point A to point B seamlessly. Awesome weapons, though the game really needed a sniper rifle. Irritating NPCs get in your way, but it's a small price to pay for a game with perfect controls, excellent storyline, and some of the best mapping ever.  Play this game, I cannot stress that enough!
Masterpiece.<3

Half-Life 2 is one of the BEST games I have ever played. Great storyline, great gameplay, great graphics (for 2009), and it's worth re-playing. The sequals aren't as good, but honestly, you kind of need them to live. Half-Life 2 has a major cliffhanger at the end (and quite franquely, so does Half-Life 2: Episode 2) and so you need the sequals because of it. Get the Orange Box, this is in it and all the games in the Orange Box are amazing and it's a great price. So get off your lazy a** and, if you like games, go buy this.

Наверное вам тоже задавали вопрос "какая у тебя самая любимая игра?" и вы наверняка отвечали:
(да блин ,я так сказать не могу у меня их много).А если же вы спросите какая у меня любимая игра,то я вам без сомнения отвечу что Half-Life 2 является моей любимой игрой на все времена !Почему любимая ? Я сам не понимаю ,наверное из за атмосферы ,сюжета и персонажей (всех до единого от Джудит Мосмон до священника из ревенхольма)Я дико не любил бегать одни, я всегда хотел встретить на пути какого нибудь повстанца,я с нетерпением ждал уровней когда смогу побегать с Алекс, или Барни ! Молчаливый глав герой и загадочный G-MAN  (наверное и из за него мне полюбилась эта игра)Я один из тех людей который очень сильно ждет сиквела к Half-Life, и я рекомендую эту игру всем кто хочет знать что такое настоящий шедевр на ВСЕ ВРЕМЕНА !!! 10 из 10

This game, I loved everything about it. The combat sequences, the headcrab zombie slaying, and puzzeling puzzels all made this game great. Half Life defined a lot, and Half Life 2 pushed it forward. While we wait eagerly for Valve to learn to count to 3, we will continue to honor this game and it's sheer beauty.
